document.heading: Kiowa Gaming Commission Ordinance Act of 2025
document.text: At a duly called Session of the Legislature of the Kiowa Tribe held this 12th day of April, 2025, the following Resolution and Law were adopted.

recital.text: the Legislature is vested with the authority to pass laws and resolutions pursuant to Article VI, Section 6(a) of the Constitution of the Kiowa Tribe; and,

the Legislature has enacted and approved an Ordinance to establish and govern the Kiowa Gaming Commission ("KGC") to enact this law to govern and regulate the operation of class II and class III gaming operations in the Territory of the Kiowa Tribe; and,

the Legislature has determined that it is in the best interests of the Tribe to set high standards of ethics and conduct for the Members of the Kiowa Gaming Commissioners, in order to demonstrate the Tribe's commitment to regulate its casinos with the highest degree of integrity and professionalism; and,

the Kiowa Tribe Legislature believes that it would be in the best interest of the Tribe, to enact the "Kiowa Gaming Ordinance Act of 2025", to govern all gaming in Kiowa Tribal Territory and at all gaming facilities situated thereon.

recital.conjunction: NOW THEREFORE IT BE IT RESOLVED;
recital.text: that the Legislature hereby enacts the attached law entitled, "Kiowa Gaming Commission Ordinance of 2025".

text.b: C E R T I F I C A T I O N

procedural-data.text: The foregoing resolution KL-CY-2025-004, was duly voted upon by the Kiowa Legislature on April 12, 2025, at a Regular Session XCVI-(96) with a vote of (6) in favor and (0) opposed, (0) abstain, and (1) absent, pursuant to the authority vested in the Legislature by the Constitution of the Kiowa Tribe.

text.b: DELIVERY OF THE RESOLUTION AND LAW TO THE CHAIRMAN

procedural-data.text: Resolution No. KL-CY-2025-004 was presented to the Chairman of the Kiowa Tribe on the 17th day of April, 2025, pursuant to the Article VI, Section 8(a)(iv) of the Constitution of the Kiowa Tribe and will become effective after signature by the Chairman or veto override by the Legislature, and as otherwise required by the Constitution.

section.heading: Short Title
section.text: This enactment shall be known as the "Kiowa Gaming Commission Act of 2025".

section.heading: Purpose
section.text: The Legislature of the Kiowa Tribe (herein the "Tribe"), empowered by the will of the Kiowa People as expressed and limited in the Kiowa Constitution, hereby enacts this law in order to govern and regulate the operations of class II and class III gaming operations in the Territory of the Kiowa Tribe.

section.heading: Findings
section.text: The Legislature hereby finds and declares that:

para.text: All gaming, including without limitation, Class II and Class III gaming is, subject to licensure by the Kiowa Gaming Commission and compliance with the requirements of Kiowa law, to be conducted in Kiowa Territory.

Gaming is conducted in accordance with this law, Indian Gaming Regulatory Act, NIGC regulations, and any other applicable laws or regulations duly promulgated by the Kiowa Gaming Commission, pursuant to this law.
The Legislature hereby enacted and approved a Kiowa Gaming Commission Act of 2025, to regulate the Kiowa Tribe's gaming business.
